titleStmt.title: An exhortacion to the Scottes to conforme them selfes to the honorable, expedie[n]t, and godly vnion, betwene the twoo realmes of Englande and Scotlande.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, James, fl. 1547.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Richardi Graftoni typis impressoris,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
